content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1547843855018{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Capture10.jpg?id=1332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Submit Resume

& Apply

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548113596836{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Apply today

Ready for a great career? Submit your resume today and we’ll reach out if your background matches one of our upcoming job opportunities.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • From my experience working with ATR has been a great experience. There is friendly, resourceful and personable staff that timely address my questions and concerns.

     

    -ATR Consultant

  • My recruiter was very good at communicating and setting up everything for my current contract. She answered all my questions promptly and always made sure someone was available for me.

     

    -ATR Consultant

  • I have used many temporary placement companies in the past but ATR International is much different from the rest. They are here to serve your needs, find you the best fitting job with the experience you have and care about you as an individual and not just another number. 

     

    -ATR Consultant

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Career Blogs

    Your 5-Minute Guide to Landing a College Internship

    10.29.2019 | Candidate Blogs, Career Advice, IT jobs, Job Search

    Internship. Internship. Internship. By now you’ve had a hundred different things about internships drilled into your head. While it’s great that college internships are on your radar, the plan for landing one can start to feel confusing or overwhelming when so many voices, articles, and tips are spinning through your mind. While there’s a lot […]

    Read the Article

    You Don’t Need A Resume If You’re Looking For An IT Job

    09.25.2014 | Career Advice, IT jobs, Job Search

    You are a busy IT professional. You may be happy in your current position or you may not, but either way, it is likely that the thought of what else lies out there for you professionally has crossed your mind. Could I make more money? Find a great place to work that is closer to […]

    Read the Article

    Why Everyone Should Care About Hot IT Jobs

    03.27.2019 | IT jobs, Technology

    Why do we like lists? It seems to be in our DNA; we like to order and rank things. It helps us understand the world more easily. Some lists are just for fun, while others can be quite serious. As ubiquitous as any are the “Best Paying” or “Hot” job lists, whether general or for […]

    Read the Article

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Latest news and activity

    How Can AI Drive Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in the Recruitment Process?

    02.29.2024 | Artificial Intelligence, Diversity

    Can AI-powered recruiting tools transform your workforce? While only 25% of organizations use artificial intelligence for HR-related activities, mainly to save time and money, this revolutionary technology can serve an even greater purpose—beyond generating job descriptions and streamlining workflows.  AI has the power to diversify your candidate base and drive unbiased decision-making throughout the hiring […]

    Read the Article

    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
